Tomorrow we start out on the road. Check out the Journey to New Earth page for more info on where we're going. Missouri, Wisconsin, Minnesota here we come.
Thanks to everyone that came out to the last few shows. Both the Gig and the Farmers' Market were real highlights for me. Here's a video of me playing a new song Summer Drug.

I love being on the road. Songs write themselves when you are traveling. September is my favorite month to see the country.

I haven't played a show in Madison since I left in 1999. This is also a first time having a partner in crime on the road with me (Lavinia is coming along). We are going to have a great time.

I'll try to post updates from the road.

See you in the heartland!

September 7th, 9:35pm
